channel.title: People dislike Minecraft until they play?
channel.description:
I've noticed that a lot of friends of mine would just look at the game and say "sucks" just because of the graphics. I even had the same view on it but once I played it was great. The same thing would happen to my friends, once I got them to play they loved it.
I was just wondering if anyone else has experienced this?

item.title: People dislike Minecraft until they play?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:30, topic:381916”][quote author=Neon Fortune link=topic=477726.msg3496752#msg3496752 date=1297379472]

I still haven’t tried it and ain’t thinking of, just don’t get it… building blocks?

impossible. lol theres no bug, its re coding the “JAVA” Client XD
Its fun, you should try it. They have a free version on minecraft.net but it sucks way more than the full version.
[/quote]
Or you can just download a cracked client and fap violently at the awesomeness of the person who released it then rage (FUUUUUUUUUUUUUU) when Notch patches the bug that allows people to download the client.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: People dislike Minecraft until they play?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:16, topic:381916”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=477726.msg3495780#msg3495780 date=1297304673]
People ask me what the point of the game is, I just say survive.
I get them to play like 2 nights, making sure they don’t die (that’s a turnoff).
Once you get that far, you’re golden.
[/quote]
I deleted Whole worlds just to do that.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: People dislike Minecraft until they play?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

casey.:

I don’t care what graphics look like, it’s just a game with absolutely no plot or amusement.

The entire game is designed so you can create your own plot and your own goals.
That being said, I really want a map reset, but of course nobody wants that but me >.<

Oh and Soulcist, you’re right, I’m pretty sure the coding could be made more efficient in a lot of cases… Just have to figure those for ourselves?!

Read full topic

I have 136 GB.
